name: Spiky Rubble
desc:
A weird spiky piece of rubble that is Wally's most valuable item.
<blue>On Hold:</>On defense, enemies are inflicted with Rock Punctures at the start of combat. Paired up ally gets +10 DEF and RES for each tier of this unit, and restores 25% Max HP at the beginning of each turn.
If ally can use axes, grants ally Wally Smash when paired up.
